keyMappings:
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp
map D scrollFullPageDown
map U scrollFullPageUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map zh scrollToLeft
map zl scrollToRight

# map  reload

map yy copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map gu goUp
map gU goToRoot

map i enterInsertMode
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

map <c-]> passNextKey

map gi focusInput
map ff LinkHints.activateMode
map ft LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map fT LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map fq LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map fd LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map fi LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito
map fc LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

# map  goPrevious
# map  goNext
map gf nextFrame
map gF mainFrame

map m Marks.activateCreateMode swap
map ` Marks.activateGotoMode swap
map o Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab
map T Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

# map  Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
# map  Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind
map * findSelected
map # findSelectedBackwards

# map  goBack
# map  goForward

map <a-t> createTab

# map  previousTab
# map  nextTab

map <c-i> visitPreviousTab
map 0 firstTab
map $ lastTab
map <c-q> duplicateTab
map <a-p> togglePinTab
map <a-m> toggleMuteTab

# map  removeTab
# map  restoreTab

map W moveTabToNewWindow

# map  closeTabsOnLeft
# map  closeTabsOnRight
# map  closeOtherTabs
# map  moveTabLeft
# map  moveTabRight

map zz setZoom
map zi zoomIn
map zo zoomOut
map z0 zoomReset
map ? showHelp

# map  toggleViewSource
searchEngines:
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
gi: https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Images
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
gd: https://drive.google.com/drive/search?q=%s Google Drive
w: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s Wikipedia
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
bing: https://www.bing.com/search?setmkt=en-GB&q=%s Bing
brave: https://search.brave.com/search?q=%s Brave Search
yahoo: https://search.yahoo.com/search?p=%s&ei=UTF-8
tr: https://translate.google.com/?source=osdd#auto|auto|%s Google Translator
recent: https://www.google.com/search?hl=en&tbo=1&tbs=qdr:y&q=%s Google (last year only)
site: javascript:location='https://www.google.com/search?num=100&q=site:'+escape(location.hostname)+'+%s'
wa: https://www.wolframalpha.com/input/?i=%s Wolfram|Alpha

a: https://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/external-search/?field-keywords=%s&mode=blended Amazon
e: https://www.ebay.com/sch/?_nkw=%s eBay
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s GitHub
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s StackOverflow
ud: https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=%s UrbanDictionary
ph: https://www.phind.com/search?q=%s Phind
qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s&t=all
mdn: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/search?q=%s MDN
fb: https://firebase.google.com/s/results?q=%s Firebase
imdb: https://www.imdb.com/find?s=all&q=%s IMDB
trello: https://trello.com/search?q=%s Trello
cc: https://ccsearch.creativecommons.org/?search_fields=title&search_fields=creator&search_fields=tags&search=%s
hn: https://www.hnsearch.com/search#request/submissions&q=%s&start=0 HackerNews
su: https://superuser.com/search?q=%s SuperUser
sh: http://symbolhound.com/?q=%s SymbolHound
